description: Try our easy to follow Pea And Kale Soup With Parmesan recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pea And Kale Soup With Parmesan Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch kale, stems and spines removed, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Add olive oil to a heavy based large soup pan on medium heat. Add the garlic and onion. Gently saut√© until onion is translucent.
Add the kale, spinach, peas, and stock. Bring to a simmer and continue to cook for 15 minutes or until peas are tender.
Remove pan from the heat and add the lemon juice, Mil Lel shredded parmesan and basil leaves. Blend with stick blender until smooth.
To serve, place soup in serving bowls and top with a sprinkle of seeds and Mil Lel shaved parmesan.
